short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds one of over 200 quotes to any mention of "Donald Trump"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans the current page for "Donald Trump", "Donald J. Trump", or "Donald John Trump" and adds one of over 200 quotes from Twitter, interviews, speeches, etc.
